title: (x) Looking for close match to STIMacSans - Bodega Sans {Rainer}
content:
Please hold your fire! I’m wearing a new hat at work, and it seems that my predecessor suffered from FFFS (fondness for free fonts syndrome). It’s a low-budget project, but the client is insisting on an exact match. My former colleague is out of the country and I’m up the proverbial creek.  
Your suggestions will be welcomed with open arms (and a modest donation to Typophile).  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907012330im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/stimac_sans_3834.gif)
